experiences.experience_description: I assisted a teacher in charge of teaching elementary school students based on scratch-program to provide fun and interest in software.

There had been no good perception based on web-techniques in my college. For such a reason, I have no change to learn them. So, I made a club for it. Finally, I could help students who would like to learn about web.

I sometimes have been picturing someone use applications which I created. It was too good to be expressed. With this club on opening business, I could know about starting business. I was in charge of developing web applications. Although it could not be launched, the experience of many contests and educations came to me as an opportunity to grow.

Cizion is a company which offers commenting services based on social networks. As a similar company, reminds us of “Disqus”. I was in charge of development and support for clients. Other than that, I performed projects based on openAPI and like KPIs.

Darmasoft is a company which makes websites. I mainly created and maintained websites. Other than that, I worked to improve website performance and to build environment for collaboration such as a development server and source management.
Vtouch is a company which offers virtual touch solutions. I mainly create applications for home and a car and Digital signage. Other than that, I’m working on modularization and the company system.

educations.education_description:
I liked math, so I had completed natural sciences.

I liked playing and games, so I used to receive awards from starcraft and singing contest. I spent my high school days as normal.

I was going to went back to school to the sophomore after I get discharged from military service. Meanwhile I was decided to transfer to computer sciences from oceanography. I thought I got a late start than others, so I always have strived to improve competence. Finally, when I was in senior, I got a job, so I could have worked faster than others.
